About me

Let me tell you a few things...

Bio information

Name : Paul Ciprian Andrica

Age : 23

Location : 3202 Rillaar, Belgium

Born in : Timisoara, Romania

Languages : English, French, Dutch, Romanian

I'm a young webdesiner, ever since I started learning the 'craft' of webdesigning 2 years ago at TKO Leuven, It became my absolute passion I love to code beautiful websites and I'm always eager to learn more and take it up a step everyday.

My dream is to become a developper and become a staple in the developping world, I am very abitious and never back down from a challange.

Personality

A few character traits.

Creative : I love thinking outside the norm, always looking for unique ways to do something.

Team player : I am friendly and sociable always love working in a team, I guide myself from an old romanian saying "where there are lots, power increses".

Motivated : Always intrested to see the finished result of a project that I work on, thats what motivates me.

Confident : I believe in my powers of achieving something, nothing is too hard to reach.

Idealistic : I always look for perfection in things that I work on and I take close attention to details.

Ambitious : I aim high, that's why learning new things is very important for me since it helps me to grow.
